I haven't seen any of the thors
I think it's the best of the bunch. The only prerequisite viewing (if any) would be the second Thor, I think.
I'm a big fan or movies like Forrest Gump (1994) and Billy Madison (1995)

I couldn't stay focused.

No i've never seen that
